reviewText: 4 great movies on one DVD
4 great movies... worth the price, make sure you have plenty of popcorn...

I was surprised to see these four favorites together at such a reasonable price and wondered if I was going to be disappointed in some unexpected way.  I wasn't.  Very pleased with what I received.

prompt delivery; love all four of these movies

What a deal - four of my favorite "timeless" films in one inexpensive DVD collection. These are great stories, top quality productions, with first rate directors and actors. They are all the kind of movies that will be just as worth watching 500 years from now.
Great value!
Great movies at unbeatable price!
These are great movies and I am completely satisfied. Good quality.
Nice to have some very special movies in one.
you just have to love these movies
What's not to love? Four great movies, cheap price, and high quality!
I got this mainly for Master and Commander. Excellent movie.

case was broken when I received it.

Warning. I bought this hoping, thinking it was the original theatrical version of "The Last of the Mohicans."  It is not and I despise the director's cut. Despise it, I say! Where on earth can I buy a DVD of the one I want?
Four movies for the price of one. I bought it for Last of the Mohicans, but with three bonus features.
great movies

It is four great films for one solid price.  If you still have a DVD player it is a total win.
